# PLAYER::GET_IS_USING_FPS_THIRD_PERSON_COVER

## Summary
Returns if we are using third perspon cover in FPS Mode

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns profile setting 237.
